legislation: Batteries and Accumulators (Placing on the Market) Regulations 2008
description: I. Letter dated 13/05/2008 from Malcolm Wicks MP to Peter Luff MP regarding the deposit of the consultation document on the Batteries and Accumulators and Waste Batteries and Accumulators Directive (2006/66/EC). II. Consultation document on the Batteries and Accumulators and Waste Batteries and Accumulators Directive (2006/66/EC). Incl. partial impact assessment. 88 p.
department: Dept for Business Enterprise and Regulatory Reform
